SUMMARY: It's hard to find a Black therapist who can address racial trauma, anxiety and more. This brief guide can help.

TITLE: Here’s What I Want My White Friends To Know About My Encounters With The Police
SUMMARY: "There’s a distinctive sound made when that many hands slap holster leather and armored SWAT members yank their long guns level. I shot my hands skyward."
